results.title: Oral combined hydrochlorothiazide and lisinopril vs nifedipine for postpartum hypertension: a comparative-effectiveness pilot randomized controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Participants were randomized to receive either combined @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ therapy or @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ therapy after stratifying the participants by diagnosis (chronic @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ vs @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pregnancy_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D046110 @@@hypertensive disorders of pregnancy@@@).

citations.NLM: Fishel Bartal M, Blackwell SC, Pedroza C, Lawal D, Amro F, Samuel J, Chauhan SP, Sibai BM. Oral combined hydrochlorothiazide and lisinopril vs nifedipine for postpartum hypertension: a comparative-effectiveness pilot randomized controlled trial. Am J Obstet Gynecol. 2023 Feb 12;():. PMID: 36787814
